body: So I had to reset my entire mc and everything but now I can't put optifine in my .minecraft folder if you know why pls tell meh :(
body_tagged: So I had to reset my entire mc and everything but now I can't put optifine in my .minecraft folder if you know why pls tell meh :(
title: Help!

replies.body: Im pretty sure all you need to do is download optifine from optifine.net if you haven't already and run it, it will then automatically make a profile w/ optifine installed
replies.body_tagged: Im pretty sure all you need to do is download optifine from optifine.net if you haven't already and run it, it will then automatically make a profile w/ optifine installed

replies.body:
Download optifine

Right click the zip file
Open with
Java
"hit install"
replies.body_tagged:
Download optifine

Right click the zip file
Open with
Java
"hit install"

replies.body: There is no need to put optifine in a folder, like mentioned above, just install it.
replies.body_tagged: There is no need to put optifine in a folder, like mentioned above, just install it.
